title: Ama-Milestones kanye Nokushiwo - Ithempeli le-Orbital
heading: Ama-Milestone & Izimpawu
description: Lo msebenzi wobuciko weminyaka eminingi uyingxenye ye-13th Mercosul Bienal e-Porto Alegre, e-Brazil, ephethwe ngu-Marcelo Dantas. Ifakwe ohlwini olude lwe-Lumen Prize 2022 - Futures Award. Iphinde yawina Isigaba se-ArtSat somncintiswano we-CubeDesign 2021, okhuthazwa yi-Brazilian Institute of Space Research (INPE).
